articles.title: Ghostwire: Tokyo gets an Xbox Series X and Game Pass release date - Polygon
articles.description: Tango Gameworks’ supernatural horror action game Ghostwire: Tokyo is no longer a PS5 exclusive. The Xbox Series X and Game Pass release of Ghostwire: Tokyo is now set for April 12.
articles.content: Tango Gameworks supernatural action-adventure game Ghostwire: Tokyo is coming to Xbox Series X and Microsofts Game Pass subscription service on April 12, publisher Bethesda Softworks announced Wednes… [+2069 chars]

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy A54 has a bright 1000-nit display and looks more like a flagship phone | Engadget - Engadget
articles.description: While there are no major shakeups coming from the Galaxy A53 to the A54, there are some notable changes, including a redesign that’s more closely aligned to the Galaxy S family of phones, with metal detail on the cameras that don’t stick out of the back..
articles.content: Its that quiet moment between Samsung launching its Galaxy S flagships and its, well, other flagships that just happen to fold. The perfect time, then, to update its midrange A series and add to the … [+3058 chars]

articles.author: Mansur Shaheen
articles.title: Mediterranean diet rich in nuts, oils and leafy veg slashes risk of an early death in women - Daily Mail
articles.description: An Australian research team found that eating a Mediterranean diet could drop a woman's risk of dying by any cause by 23 percent. Heart disease and stroke risk dropped in particular.
articles.content:
Following the Mediterranean diet can slash a woman's chance of an early death by nearly a quarter, a study suggests.
In the study of more than 700,000 women, the famed diet decreases a woman's chanc… [+2995 chars]
